security-warning.varnostna-opozorila: - heksilcinamaldehid/Hexyl Cinnamal. Lahko povzroči alergijski odziv.

ingredient-information.sestavine: 5-15 % kationske površinsko aktivne snovi; parfumi (Hexyl Cinnamal, Linalool, Citronellol, Alpha-Isomethyl Ionone, Benzyl Salicylate, Limonene, Coumarin, Geraniol, Butylphenyl Methylpropional, Eugenol), konzervansi (2-Bromo-2-nitropropane-1, 3-diol, Methylchloroisothiazolinone, Methylisothiazolinone).
